title: CU Boulder Alumni Association Veterans Scholarship Fund
description: To provide merit and/or need-based scholarships for Veterans, Active Military, Reserve, National Guard and/or their dependents at CU Boulder who are in good standings with the university and their respective branches of service.
marketingContent: To provide merit and/or need-based scholarships for Veterans, Active, Military, Reserve, National Guard and/or their dependents at CU Boulder who are in good standings with the university and their respective branches of service.
